triple.name: window2xhtml
triple.info: Credits: Simon Clemen, Mads Østerby Olesen (both ex-DAIMI).
triple.notes: Most of the 27 errors found are caused by DTD´s primitive string type system: The transform takes strings from the DTD-specified input document, and puts them in id, href etc. attributes in the output. An XML Schema or Reduced Relax NG input schema with a better string type system could solve this.
